DOC.brief_summary: Helium—oxygen mixture(heliox) was suggested to be beneficial in meconium aspiration syndrome in previous studies，but the evidence was limited．The aim of the study was to assess the effectiveness of synchronize intermittent mandatory ventilation (SIMV) with heliox (70% helium and 30% oxygen) on length of ventilation(LoV) and cardiopulmonary protection in meconium aspiration syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Helium Oxygen Mixture in the Treatment of Meconium Aspiration Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Subject has the diagnosis of neonatal meconium aspiration syndrome Subject has Synchronous instruction ventilation History of congenital or hereditary disease
